categories.category: Articles to be expanded since March 2008
Articles with invalid date parameter in template

row.col: Please help improve this article or section by expanding it. Further information might be found on the or at . (March 2008)''

sec.p: According to Ellen M. Voorhees, The evaluation of information retrieval system is the process of assessing how well a system meets the information needs of its users
Recall = (No of relevant items retrieved / Total relevant items in the collection) * 100
Precision = (No of relevant items retrieved/Total no of items retrieved) * 100
